name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. William CAULEY, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. William CAULEY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM,
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM,

attorneys: A. Charles Peruto, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick,, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
369 A.2d 728
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. William CAULEY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 12, 1976.
Decided Feb. 28, 1977.
A. Charles Peruto, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick,, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
